class_notes: CEL: students will be assigned a service activity requiring 18 hours of work outside of regularly scheduled class time
course_description: Introductory examination of fundamental moral questions, such as the best way of life for a human being, the relationship between happiness and moral excellence, and the nature of ethical reasoning, as treated by major philosophers in the history of philosophy.
